products.name: Laptop Pro 15
products.description: A high-performance laptop for professionals and creatives. Features a stunning 15-inch display and next-gen processors.

products.name: Ergo Wireless Mouse
products.description: Ergonomic wireless mouse designed for all-day comfort. Features silent clicks and a precision sensor.

products.name: Mechanical Keyboard
products.description: A full-sized mechanical keyboard with tactile switches and customizable RGB backlighting.

products.name: UltraWide Monitor
products.description: 34-inch UltraWide QHD monitor, perfect for multitasking and immersive gaming.

products.name: HD Webcam
products.description: 1080p HD Webcam with a wide-angle lens and dual-microphone array for clear video calls.

products.name: USB-C Docking Station
products.description: Expand your laptop's connectivity with this 8-in-1 USB-C hub. Includes HDMI, Ethernet, and 3x USB 3.0 ports.

products.name: Gaming Headset
products.description: Over-ear gaming headset with 7.1 surround sound and a noise-cancelling mic.

products.name: Laptop Stand
products.description: Adjustable aluminum laptop stand to improve ergonomics and cooling.

products.name: 2TB External SSD
products.description: Blazing fast 2TB portable SSD with USB-C for quick file transfers.

products.name: 27-inch 4K Monitor
products.description: A crisp 27-inch 4K IPS panel for color-accurate work and vibrant media.

products.name: WiFi 6 Router
products.description: Next-generation WiFi 6 mesh router for high-speed, stable internet.

products.name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Waterproof (IPX7) portable speaker with 12-hour battery life and deep bass.

products.name: Braided USB-C Cable (2m)
products.description: Durable nylon braided USB-C to USB-C cable for 100W charging and data.

products.name: Gaming Desktop PC
products.description: High-end gaming desktop with liquid cooling, 32GB RAM, and a top-tier GPU.

products.name: Large Mouse Mat
products.description: Extended desk mouse mat (900x400mm) with a smooth glide surface.

products.name: Laptop Backpack
products.description: Water-resistant smart backpack with a 15.6-inch padded sleeve and USB charging port.
